text: Ra tyasa a'ima'i jasto nahunu jasale parisramale ta dhago katyo, pheri tyasala'i cumdalera tukraâ€“tukra garihalyo. Timile aphna sapathaharula'i apasama yasa kurako madhyama bana'una nathala, ki eka samuha arko samuhabhanda badhi saktisali huna pugos. Kuro matra yahi cha ki allahale yasa vacabata timro pariksa li'iraheko cha ra juna kuraharuma timile vivada gardachau, kiyamatako dina allahale tiniharuko vastavikata timiharumathi prakata garnecha
